attributes.action: provide a safe road traffic system for pedestrians crossing to/from Metro House roundabout (Chichester, W Sussex)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Staff and visitors accessing the offices/fire station based on the Northgate Roundabout are putting their lives at risk when crossing the road. The volume and speed of traffic and lack of lighting makes this extremely dangerous, and it is only a matter of time before someone is seriously injured or killed.

A risk assessment should be carried out by the local Council in relation to the public's health and safety.
